column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The classic Chicago pizza and Italian food that delivers some of the best deep dish.  The cheese
column2: crust and sauage are delicious and rich.  Extra cheese is a must! The tomato sauce can be a bit sugary
column3: and I wish it was more robust with tomato flavor instead of the sweetness.  Good deep-dish all around but with a varying amount of quality throughout the Chicagoland area (I think the best one is in Evanton
column4: actually).  Remember to order ahead if possible
column5: takes about one hour to bake a deep dish pizza.
